org.jvnet.hudson.plugins.darcs
Class DarcsScm

java.lang.Object
  hudson.scm.SCM
      org.jvnet.hudson.plugins.darcs.DarcsScm
All Implemented Interfaces:
hudson.ExtensionPoint, hudson.model.Describable<hudson.scm.SCM>, java.io.Serializable
public class DarcsScm
extends hudson.scm.SCM
implements java.io.Serializable

Darcs is a patch based distributed version controll system. Contains the job configuration options as fields.

Author:
Sven Strittmatter
See Also:
http://darcs.net/, Serialized Form
